overview: "Dragons are not boats, Dragons are people." Against the background of sailing races in the Dragon class, real life stories of specific participants-heroes unfold. Each of them is unique in its own way, but their lines are based on a common idea – in order to contribute to the restoration of the Dragon class and all sailing, the hero is forced to sacrifice something personal (money, time, relationships). Only by making a sacrifice can you do a really meaningful thing.
title: How to Tame the Dragon?
